name: Big Beach Volleyball
description:
Game created for My First GameJam.   

Play Beach Volley as a square, but be careful because when you make points... your adversary becomes BIGGER!

The game controls are 

R- Restart Points,

Esc- Return To Menu

W-Jump, 

AD-Move, 

Up-Arrow-Player 2 Jump,

 Left and Right arrows- Player 2 Move

Player1 is compatible with joystick.

Yes, you can double jump.

Not all the assets are from me because I hadn't enough time to work on my game due personal reasons. Also, the game is not complete, so you don't have a win or lose scene.
